mapper.select: SELECT reviewId,content,attachedPhotoIds,COUNT(placeId) as count FROM review WHERE placeId = #{placeId} ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT pointId,userId,reviewId,point,type,action,date FROM triple.point WHERE reviewId = #{reviewId} AND userId = #{userId} order by date DESC limit 1

SELECT point FROM( SELECT * FROM triple.point WHERE userId = #{userId} AND (reviewId, date) in ( SELECT reviewId, max(date) as date from triple.point group by reviewId ) ORDER BY date desc ) t GROUP BY t.reviewId
